name: Band-Aid Brand Tru-Stay Sheer Strips Adhesive Sterile Bandages for First Aid & Wound Protection, Individually Wrapped Wound Care Bandages for Minor Cuts & Scrapes, Assorted Sizes, 80 ct

These sterile adhesive bandages are sheer in appearance and provide comfortable wound protection for your minor cuts, scrapes and burns. Covering minor wounds can help protect them from dirt and germs that may cause infection

Adhesive bandages for first aid and wound care feature Tri-Ply backing with unique adhesive for real staying power. The bandages stay put so you don't have to. Larger Sized bandages feature a 4-sided seal to protect wounds against dirt and germs
Each sterile wound care bandage is made with a Quilt-Aid pad that is designed to cushion and protect painful wounds and helps to prevent reinjury, offering trusted protection for your healing wounds

product_description: BAND-AID Brand Sterile Tru-Stay Sheer Strips Adhesive First Aid Bandages offer comfortable, sheer protection of minor wounds, cuts, scrapes and burns. These flexible BAND-AID Brand Adhesive Bandages for wound care in assorted sizes are designed to provide lightweight, dependable protection to cover most minor wounds. Covering wounds can help heal minor cuts and scrapes and protect you against dirt and germs that may cause infection. The individually wrapped bandages feature Tri-Ply Backing with unique adhesive for real staying power, so the bandage stays put so you don't have to. The unique Quilt-Aid Comfort Pad on these BAND-AID Brand Tru-Stay Sheer Strips Adhesive Bandages is designed to cushion and protect painful wounds while you heal and helps to prevent reinjury. This package includes 80 sheer bandages in assorted sizes, making these bandages a perfect addition to any home first aid kit or wound care supplies.

short_description: 200-Piece Assorted Value Pack: Never run out of protection with our bulk box containing 200 flexible fabric bandages. This set includes a versatile mix of 4 essential shapes: 60 round, 50 oval, 30 square, and 60 strips, ensuring you always have the perfect fit for minor injury.

Ideal for Face: Designed to be discreet and gentle, these are perfect small bandages for face blemishes, shaving nicks, or injection spots. Their compact size makes them an choice as a nose bandage, providing coverage without dominating your facial features.

Breathable and Flexible Fabric: Crafted from woven fabric, these small bandaids stretch and move with your skin. The breathable material allows airflow to the wound for faster healing while remaining comfortable enough to wear all day on moving joints like fingers or knuckles.

Ouch Free Non Stick Pad: Each bandage features a soft, absorbent center pad that cushions the wound but won't stick to it. This ensures that removing the bandage is painless and won't disrupt the healing process, making them safe adults alike.

Reliable Everyday Protection: Whether it’s a paper cut at the office or a scrape at home, our adhesive keeps dirt out. These spot bandages stay securely in place on hands, feet, and face, making them an essential addition to first aid kit or medicine cabinet.

product_description: BAND-AID Brand Adhesive Bandages Family Variety Pack delivers 280 sterile, individually wrapped flexible bandages for wounds in assorted sheer and clear sizes, making it ideal for first aid wound care of minor cuts, scrapes, and burns. This comprehensive assortment includes five shapes and sizes: 8 Sheer Strips (1.75 x 4 in), 120 Sheer Strips (1 x 3 in), 40 Clear Strips (0.75 x 3 in), 82 Sheer Strips (0.625 x 2.25 in), and 30 Clear Spots (0.875 x 0.875 in). Each adhesive bandage features a QUILT-AID Comfort Pad to cushion wounds and a Tri-Ply backing with unique adhesive for secure, flexible coverage that stays in place, even with movement. The sheer strips offer a low-profile look, while clear spots provide a transparent barrier for a more discreet appearance. All bandages are sterile and individually wrapped for hygienic use and easy access, making this variety pack perfect for home first aid kits, first aid kit refill supplies, and on-the-go wound care. FSA and HSA eligible, this assortment ensures you have the right bandage for every minor injury, supporting your family's wound care needs and helping covered wounds heal better by protecting against dirt and germs that may cause infection. To use, clean and dry the wound, apply the sterile bandage to clean, dry skin, and replace daily or when wet to maintain effective protection. Trust BAND-AID Brand for reliable protection and comfort for everyday minor wound care needs, and keep your first aid kit well-stocked with this essential variety pack.
